items.content_html: A lightweight utility for truncating strings in JavaScript. It allows you to dynamically set a length limit and append a custom truncation symbol (e.g., `...`) when the string exceeds the specified limit. This package handles various edge cases, ensuring robust performance.
items.title: mosh1331/simple-string-truncate:  A lightweight utility for truncating strings in JavaScript. It allows you to dynamically set a length limit and append a custom truncation symbol (e.g., `...`) when the string exceeds the specified limit. This package handles various edge cases, ensuring robust performance.
